column4: Hi all, I just did a  do-release-upgrade (karmic -> lucid) on my dedicated server. everything went ok, I said yes for rebooting .... but my server don't reboot ! any idea ? anyone had the same issue ?
what messages do you see on boot?
I don't see anything ... it's a dedicated server ... but there is nothing on logs
you'll need to see the screen to see whats going on
